properties.description:
Note: Only fields marked with an asterisk (<font color="red">*</font>) are required.
The three values for qualifier are "approximate", "inferred", and "questionable". In AACR2 terms, approximate is equivalent to "ca.", inferred is equivalent to brackets, and questionable is equivalent to ?
The display version of the person's name
properties.title: Display Name
